screen.name: DeviceManager2Message
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint textsize = self["messagetext"].getSize() textsize = (1780, textsize[1] + 10) t = int(textsize[1] + 10)
if (114 >t): top = 966 self["messagetext"].instance.move(ePoint(120, int((114-t)/2))) else: top = 1080 - (textsize[1] + 7) self["messagetext"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint(0,top))

screen.name: Menu
screen.title: Main menu
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint c = self["menu"].count() if (18 >c): #self["menu"].resize(eSize(610,(c*60))) self.instance.resize(eSize(610,(c*60))) self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-610)/2,((1080-(c*60))/2)+32)) top = str(((1080-((c*60)))/2)+63) else: self.instance.move(ePoint((1920-610)/2,((1080-900)/2)+32)) top = str((1080-900)/2) print top

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (610, 60), flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0) ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 60 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 40 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 160 wsizex = textsize[0] + 130 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 >wsizex): wsizex = 900 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 30 + offset) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1]+20)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, (1080-wsizey)/2))
